title: cant connent with the pvp center
body: we can log in the game, but the chat or others, we cant play with others. 05.05.16{{item:3751}}

replies.body: Could be related to some instability that we saw earlier today.  Should have since been resolved, but if you're still having this issue, let me know!

Just Got Booted from a ranked game where we were ahead big time and about to take dragon..
I keep trying to reconnect and nothing.. 
something is wrong i have never had this problem - with this game .. 
or any other game i own for that matter..
something is booting people off and not allowing them to get back into game..

its not my machine/internet - trust me on that one
same although i cant even play solo queue keeps loading then says unknown error
